name: <<vec::drain::Drain<'_, T, A> as core::ops::Drop>::drop::DropGuard<'r, 'a, T, A> as core::ops::Drop>::drop

vec::Vec::<T, A>::len.doc:
Returns the number of elements in the vector, also referred to
 as its 'length'.

 # Examples

 ```
 let a = vec![1, 2, 3];
 assert_eq!(a.len(), 3);
 ```
